mdRecord.dcterms:title: Road to Tomb
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Gardner, Alexander, 1821-1882 (possible)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Glass negative of stereoscopic view from the Mount Vernon wharf landing looking towards the road to the tomb. An open gate is visible at the end of the causeway. Possibly one of the views from the stereograph sets created by Alexander Gardner for the Mount Vernon Ladies' Association. Remnants of tape are visible along the edges of the glass.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
Wharf
